entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to rain near noon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
